description: Youre stranded in an abandoned polar research cabin as the temperature plummets and wind howls outside.

rooms.description: Metal desks covered in frost. A generator hums weakly in the corner.
Shelves hold frozen food cans and broken tools.
Empty cots and scattered notebooks. One bed has fresh footprints beside it.

generator.name: Emergency Generator
generator.description: A backup generator running on its last reserves of fuel.

radio.name: Communication Radio
radio.description: A weather-beaten radio that might still reach someone.

coat.name: Insulated Coat
coat.description: A heavy winter coat that could save your life.

can.name: Frozen Food Can
can.description: A can of preserved food, frozen solid.

toolbox.name: Tool Box
toolbox.description: A metal box containing various repair tools.

notebook.name: Research Notebook
notebook.description: A notebook with logs from the previous research team.

thermos.name: Steel Thermos
thermos.description: An insulated thermos, still slightly warm.
